attributes.additional_details:
To help create jobs for British Passport holders living within the UK, companies should be limited to how many foreign nationals/cheap labour they are allowed to take on.    Big generation projects should also force companies to employ all/any unemployed in the area.
Companies should not be descrimated putting our country first.  This is not about being English its about our cultured society being given the opportunity to put the Great back into Britian!
